abstract.t: The Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol [L2TP] defines a mechanism fortunneling PPP [PPP] sessions.One of the features introduced by V.92 [V92] is the ability of theclient modem to put the call on hold. The L2TP base protocol doesnot provide any means to signal this event. This document describesa method used to indicate when a client modem has gone on-hold.
